programme.title: הכלב והחתולה: המרדף המטורף (מדובב)
programme.desc: קומדיה לכל המשפחה בדיבוב אמיר שורוש ("ראמזי") ומיקי מוכתר עורי. גור כלבים שבלע יהלום יקר וחתולה מפונקת נפגשים במקרה לאחר שנשכחו בשדה התעופה. כעת עליהם למצוא דרך לחזור לבעליהם, בעוד אחריהם רודף שוטר שמחפש אחר היהלום. 2024.

programme.title: חלומו של דולפין (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציה. סיפורו המופלא של דניאל, דולפין צעיר שחולם לשחות בגלים הגדולים שמחוץ ללגונה הקטנה שבה הוא חי. לילה אחד ניתנת לו ההזדמנות, והוא יוצא למסע קסום במרחבי הים הפתוח. במאי: אדוארדו שולדט. 2010. כ' עב'.

programme.title: מוריס המדהים (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציית הרפתקאות מהיוצרים של "שרק", ע"פ ספר הילדים האהוב. חתול מטורלל בעל לב זהב, מגיע אל עיירה חדשה עם חבריו העכברים, ושני ילדים סקרנים. יחד הם נקלעים להרפתקאה מסוכנת במיוחד. דיבוב: אסף פריינטא. במאי: טובי גנקל. 2022. כ' עב'.

programme.title: בלאגן על ארבע (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציה מקסימה. כלבלב מפונק מוצא עצמו ברחוב לאחר שנמלט מהילדים החמדנים של בעליו הקודמים. כעת כשהוא מנסה לשרוד בעולם האמיתי, באים לעזרתו כלב רחוב קשוח ומוזיקאית צעירה. דיבוב: דן קיזלר, דקלה הדר. במאי: קווין ג'ונסון. 2019.

programme.title: ביגפוט ג'וניור 2 (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציית הרפתקאות לכל המשפחה. מספר חודשים לאחר שחזר לביתו, מחליט ביגפוט לעזוב שוב את בנו אדם ולצאת להציל עמק באלסקה מתאגיד דלק אכזרי. כשהוא נעלם באורח מסתורי, יוצא אדם למסע חיפושים אחר אביו. 2020. כ' עב'.

programme.title: שומרת הדרקונים (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציית הרפתקאות. קיסר מרושע שכעת שולט בסין העתיקה, כולא את הדרקונים, שהיו בעבר חברים של בני האדם. ילדה צעירה ומלאת תושייה, עוזרת לדרקון האחרון שטרם נשבה לברוח, ויחד הם מנסים להציל את שאר הדרקונים. דיבוב עב': ניר ברק. 2024.

programme.title: נורם יוצא לחופשה (מדובב)
programme.desc: הרביעי בסדרת סרטי האנימציה לכל המשפחה, מיוצרי 'צעצוע של סיפור'. נורם, המלך הנערץ של דובי הקוטב יוצא עם משפחתו לחופשה חלומית בסין, שבמהרה משתבשת לאחר שהכתר שלו נעלם באופן מסתורי. דיבוב עב': לורן סביר. 2020. כ' עב'.

programme.title: גנוב על המיניונים (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציה. סרט ההמשך ל"גנוב על הירח". גרו מגויס הפעם לליגת האנטי-רשעים כדי להתמודד עם אויב חדש, ויוצא בעקבותיו יחד עם המיניונים המצחיקים והסוכנת לוסי. דיבוב עב': אוהד שחר, ליאת הר-לב. במאים: פייר קופין, כריס רניוד. 2013.

programme.title: תולעת ספרים (מדובב)
programme.desc: הרפתקאות. עולמה של מילדרד בת ה-11 משתנה בין רגע כאשר אביה הקוסם, שמעולם לא הכירה, לוקח אותה עמו להרפתקה מופלאה בניו זילנד בחיפוש אחר פנתר אגדי בעל כוחות-על. עם: נל פישר, אלייז'ה ווד. במאית: אנט טימפסון. ארה"ב, 2024.

programme.title: רובוטריקים: ההתחלה (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציה מלאת אקשן, הסרט השמיני בסדרת "רובוטריקים". הסיפור שמעולם לא סופר על כיצד אופטימוס פריים ומגאטרון הפכו למנהיגי הרובוטריקים ואויבים מושבעים. דיבוב עב': אסף פריינטא, תמיר גינזבורג. במאי: ג'וש קולי. 2024.

programme.title: רובין וילדי היער
programme.desc: הרפתקאה משוגעת לכל המשפחה. רובין וחבריה אוהבים לשחק במשחקי דמיון ביער שליד ביתם. כשיזמית נדל"ן מרושעת מתכננת להרוס את היער ולבנות במקומו בניינים, החבורה יעשו הכול כדי לשמור על הטבע. במאי: פיל הוקינס. אנגליה, 2024.

programme.title: מיה והאריה הלבן
programme.desc: דרמת הרפתקאות לכל המשפחה. מיה בת ה-10 נאלצת לעזוב את לונדון ולעבור עם הוריה לאפריקה, שם היא מפתחת ידידות אמיצה עם גור אריות לבן ויפהפה. עם: דאניה די וילייה, מלאני לורן. במאי: ז'יל דה מייסטרה. צרפת, 2018.

programme.title: השידורים יתחדשו בקרוב

programme.title: בלש על שמונה (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציה לכל המשפחה. המפקח סאן הוא בלש-עכביש אשר פותר תעלומות בלתי פתורות בעולם החרקים. כשהוא עולה על מטוס לחופשה, הוא מגלה כי בטיסה מתבצע פשע בעל השלכות לא רק על עולם החרקים, אלא גם על בני האדם. דיבוב עב': גדי לוי. 2022.(n)

programme.title: בלאגן על ארבע (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציה מקסימה. כלבלב מפונק מוצא עצמו ברחוב לאחר שנמלט מהילדים החמדנים של בעליו הקודמים. כעת כשהוא מנסה לשרוד בעולם האמיתי, באים לעזרתו כלב רחוב קשוח ומוזיקאית צעירה. דיבוב: דן קיזלר, דקלה הדר. במאי: קווין ג'ונסון. 2019.(n)

programme.title: כלב מי שמנגן 3 (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציה מוזיקלית. לאחר מסע הופעות מסביב לעולם, חוזר בודי כלב הרוקנרול לכפר הולדתו ומצטרף לצוות שופטים בתוכנית ריאליטי מוזיקלית, כדי ללמד את הדור הבא איך עושים את זה נכון... דיבוב: ברק ברויטמן. במאי: אנתוני בל. 2022. כ' עב'.(n)

programme.title: צוות לעניין (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציית הרפתקאות מקסימה מהיוצרים של 'צעצוע של סיפור'. בובת תיאטרון חוברת לבובת כלבלב נטושה, וביחד יוצאים השניים להרפתקה בין מציאות לדמיון ברחבי העיר ניו יורק, בה הם הגיבורים הראשיים. דיבוב עב': ניר ברק, יובל בינדר. 2023.(n)

programme.title: הפינגווינים ממדגסקר (מדובב)
programme.desc: חברים מדובבים: סרטים בשפה שלנו. הפינגווינים המשעשעים מסרטי "מדגסקר" מככבים בסרט משלהם. הפעם הם משתפים פעולה עם ארגון ריגול מיוחד, במאבק מול תמנון ערמומי. דיבוב עברית: מיכאל הנגבי. 2014. כ' עב'.(n)

programme.title: אגלי דולס (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציה מעוררת השראה. האגלי דולס חיות בשלווה וללא דאגות בעיר 'אגליוויל'. העניינים משתנים כאשר הבובות מגיעות לארץ המושלמות, ומתמודדות שם לראשונה עם הקושי בלהיות שונה. דיבוב: שירלי לילו. במאי: קלי אסבורי. 2019. כ' עב'.(n)

programme.title: אסטריקס ואובליקס: הממלכה התיכונה (מדובב)
programme.desc: קומדיית הרפתקאות. שנת 50 לפנה"ס. בתו היחידה של קיסר סין נמלטת מפני נסיך מושחת שהשתלט על המדינה, ומגיעה במהלך מנוסתה למדינת גאליה. שם היא זוכה להגנה משני הלוחמים האמיצים (אך גם מגושמים), אסטריקס ואובליקס. דיבוב עב'. 2023.(n)

programme.title: גנוב על החיים (מדובב)
programme.desc: הסרט הרביעי בסדרת סרטי האנימציה המצליחה. גרו ומשפחתו מקבלים למשפחה חבר חדש: גרו ג'וניור, שמתעקש לענות את אביו שרק רוצה קצת אהבה מבנו התינוק. במקביל אויב חדש-ישן מאיים על כל המשפחה. דיבוב: יניב ביטון, ליאת הר לב. 2024.(n)

programme.title: חברים דמיוניים (מדובב)
programme.desc: הרפתקאות לכל המשפחה. ילדה צעירה מגלה כי יש לה יכולת מופלאה - לראות במציאות את החברים הדמיוניים של ילדים אחרים. כעת היא מנסה לאחד בין החברים הדמיוניים לילדים, אשר ננטשו עם השנים. עם: ריאן ריינולדס. דיבוב עב': רון לוי. 2024.(n)

programme.title: תולעת ספרים (מדובב)
programme.desc: הרפתקאות. עולמה של מילדרד בת ה-11 משתנה בין רגע כאשר אביה הקוסם, שמעולם לא הכירה, לוקח אותה עמו להרפתקה מופלאה בניו זילנד בחיפוש אחר פנתר אגדי בעל כוחות-על. עם: נל פישר, אלייז'ה ווד. במאית: אנט טימפסון. ארה"ב, 2024.(n)

programme.title: גנוב על העולם
programme.desc: להיט האנימציה עם המיניונים שמגניבים אותנו מחדש! גרו מגלה לראשונה על אחיו התאום והמוצלח. יחדיו, הם מתכננים לקחת מבלתזאר הנבל את היהלום שגנב ולהציל את העולם. עם: סטיב קארל, קריסטין וויג. בימוי: קייל בלדה, פייר קופין. 2017.(n)

programme.title: ממלכת טראביתיה (מדובב)
programme.desc: משפחה. ג'ס ולסלי מוצאים נחמה מביה"ס העוין כשהם מגלים את ממלכת טראביתיה. יחד השניים שולטים בממלכה, נלחמים בשליט האופל וזוממים מזימות נגד ביריוני ביה"ס. עם: ג'וש האצ'רסון, זואי דשנל. במאי: גאבור סופו. 2007. כ' עב'.(n)

programme.title: The Bridge on the River Kwai
Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom
Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade
Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom
Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade
The Bridge on the River Kwai
Dear John
programme.desc: A soldier falls in love with a student he meets while on two weeks' leave, and he promises to seek her out after completing his tour of duty. However, in the aftermath of the September 11 attacks, he decides to re-enlist in the army, putting their relationship to the test. Romantic drama, with Channing Tatum and Amanda Seyfried.(n)

programme.title: There Will Be Blood
programme.desc: An oil prospector presents the public image of a caring family man while nurturing a murderous ambition to seize control of land and wealth at any cost. But his insatiable greed leads to a violent conflict with a young priest who is also intent on using the people and resources of an oil-rich town for his own ends. Paul Thomas Anderson's historical drama, starring an Oscar-winning Daniel Day-Lewis, with Paul Dano and Dillon Freasier.(n)

programme.title: Elizabeth: The Golden Age
programme.desc: Queen Elizabeth I faces threats at home and abroad, as Mary, Queen of Scots plots against her while the King of Spain builds a vast armada to undertake an invasion of England. Unable to reconcile her feelings for the dashing Sir Walter Raleigh with her duty to her country, the monarch engineers a romance between the courtier and one of her ladies-in-waiting. Historical drama sequel, with Cate Blanchett, Clive Owen, Geoffrey Rush and Samantha Morton.(n)

programme.title: Love Actually
programme.desc: Ten interlinked stories of people searching for and finding love. While the newly elected, bachelor British prime minister is smitten by a junior staff member at 10 Downing Street, a heartbroken writer heads for France to get over a failed relationship, and a faded rock star aims to reinvent himself in time for Christmas. Richard Curtis's romantic comedy, with Hugh Grant, Martine McCutcheon, Emma Thompson, Alan Rickman, Colin Firth, Bill Nighy and Liam Neeson.(n)

programme.title: The Boy in the Striped Pyjamas
programme.desc: Bruno, a boy in Nazi Germany, moves to the country when his father is placed in charge of a concentration camp. While exploring the woods close to the facility's boundary, he spots a Jewish youngster being held there, and the two become friends - but Bruno remains innocently oblivious to the camp's true purpose. Drama, starring David Thewlis, Asa Butterfield and Jack Scanlon.(n)

programme.title: Dreamgirls
programme.desc: A 1960s singing trio are chosen to perform backing vocals for a popular performer - an event that launches the band on a successful career of their own. However, when the most attractive of the girls is picked as the face of the group, edging out the other two, personal rivalries begin to jeopardise their friendship. Musical drama, inspired by the rise to fame of Diana Ross and the Supremes, and starring Jamie Foxx, Beyonce Knowles, Eddie Murphy and an Oscar-winning Jennifer Hudson.(n)

programme.title: Grease
programme.desc: Rebellious American teenager Danny falls for innocent Australian girl Sandy during the summer holidays, but when he later finds out she is a new student at his school, he risks losing her love by trying to act cool in front of his friends. Romantic musical set in the 1950s, starring John Travolta, Olivia Newton-John, Stockard Channing, Jeff Conaway, Didi Conn and Sid Caesar.(n)

programme.title: Joker: Folie a Deux
programme.desc: Struggling with his dual identity, failed comedian Arthur Fleck meets the love of his life, Harleen 'Lee' Quinzel, while incarcerated at Arkham State Hospital. Musical thriller, starring Joaquin Phoenix, Lady Gaga and Brendan Gleeson.(n)

programme.title: Amadeus
programme.desc: Composer Antonio Salieri is a favoured artist in the court of Austrian emperor Joseph II, but he finds himself pushed aside in favour of Mozart. Salieri admires the younger maestro's music, but is incensed that someone so vulgar and obnoxious should be gifted with such talent. As jealousy consumes him, he plots his rival's downfall. Period drama, adapted by Peter Shaffer from his own play and starring F Murray Abraham and Tom Hulce.(n)

programme.title: Calvary
programme.desc: A priest in a rural Irish village receives a confession from a man who vows to kill him in one week as punishment for the Catholic Church's history of child abuse. The cleric spends his last seven days trying to put his community's affairs in order, but finds himself surrounded by people who harbour resentments of their own against the Church. Drama, starring Brendan Gleeson, Chris O'Dowd, Kelly Reilly, Aidan Gillen and Dylan Moran.(n)

programme.title: PS I Love You
programme.desc: Widowed Holly feels she cannot cope following the death of her husband. However, on her birthday, she receives a letter he wrote to her just before he died, encouraging her to live life to the full rather than languish in sorrow. This is just the first in a series of messages, each one sending her on wild misadventures and helping her to move on. Romantic drama based on Cecelia Ahern's novel, starring Hilary Swank, Gerard Butler and Lisa Kudrow.(n)

programme.title: Birdy
programme.desc: A young soldier devastated by his nightmarish experiences in the Vietnam War is committed to an Army mental hospital. He comes to believe he is a bird, and dreams of taking his fantasy to the logical, ultimate conclusion - by learning to fly. Alan Parker's psychological drama, based on William Wharton's novel, with Matthew Modine, Nicolas Cage, John Harkins, Karen Young and Sandy Baron.(n)

programme.title: True Grit
programme.desc: One-eyed, over-the-hill US Marshal Rooster Cogburn reluctantly agrees to help a girl track down her father's killer. The quest is complicated by a Texas Ranger, who is also on the murderer's trail, and a host of villains who have few qualms about disposing of the meddling youngster and her protector. Western, starring an Oscar-winning John Wayne alongside Jeff Corey, Kim Darby, Glen Campbell, Robert Duvall and Dennis Hopper.(n)

programme.title: There Will Be Blood
programme.desc: An oil prospector presents the public image of a caring family man while nurturing a murderous ambition to seize control of land and wealth at any cost. But his insatiable greed leads to a violent conflict with a young priest who is also intent on using the people and resources of an oil-rich town for his own ends. Paul Thomas Anderson's historical drama, starring an Oscar-winning Daniel Day-Lewis, with Paul Dano and Dillon Freasier.(n)

programme.title: Joker: Folie a Deux
programme.desc: Struggling with his dual identity, failed comedian Arthur Fleck meets the love of his life, Harleen 'Lee' Quinzel, while incarcerated at Arkham State Hospital. Musical thriller, starring Joaquin Phoenix, Lady Gaga and Brendan Gleeson.(n)

programme.title: Dallas Buyers Club
programme.desc: A man diagnosed with HIV and given 30 days to live discovers that many treatments for his condition are not available in the US. With the aid of a transsexual Aids patient, he sets up a scheme to smuggle the drugs into the country and distribute them to those in need. Fact-based drama, starring Oscar winners Matthew McConaughey and Jared Leto, with Jennifer Garner and Steve Zahn.(n)

programme.title: Exhibiting Forgiveness
programme.desc: An artist's rise to success is scuppered by an unexpected visit from his estranged father, a recovering addict desperate to reconcile. Writer/director Titus Kaphar's drama, starring André Holland and John Earl Jelks.(n)

programme.title: Jackie
programme.desc: Following the assassination of her husband, President John F Kennedy, Jacqueline Kennedy battles with grief and trauma to regain her faith, console her children, and define JFK's legacy. Director Pablo Larrain's Bafta-winning drama, starring Natalie Portman, Peter Sarsgaard and Greta Gerwig. Mica Levi provided the Oscar-nominated score.(n)

programme.title: One Life
programme.desc: In the months leading up to the Second World War, a young London stockbroker attempts to rescue hundreds of predominantly Jewish children from Nazi-occupied Czechoslovakia. Fifty years later he comes to terms with the guilt and grief he carried with him for decades. Drama based on a true story, starring Anthony Hopkins, Lena Olin and Johnny Flynn.(n)

programme.title: Dear John
programme.desc: A soldier falls in love with a student he meets while on two weeks' leave, and he promises to seek her out after completing his tour of duty. However, in the aftermath of the September 11 attacks, he decides to re-enlist in the army, putting their relationship to the test. Romantic drama, with Channing Tatum and Amanda Seyfried.(n)

programme.title: Dreamgirls
programme.desc: A 1960s singing trio are chosen to perform backing vocals for a popular performer - an event that launches the band on a successful career of their own. However, when the most attractive of the girls is picked as the face of the group, edging out the other two, personal rivalries begin to jeopardise their friendship. Musical drama, inspired by the rise to fame of Diana Ross and the Supremes, and starring Jamie Foxx, Beyonce Knowles, Eddie Murphy and an Oscar-winning Jennifer Hudson.(n)

programme.title: The Brutalist
programme.desc: When a couple flee Europe in 1947, their new lives in the US are changed by a strange client. Director Brady Corbet's drama, starring Adrien Brody, Felicity Jones, Guy Pearce and Joe Alwyn.

programme.title: The Fisher King
programme.desc: A radio DJ contemplates suicide after a listener embarks on a murderous rampage in response to one of his broadcasts. He is saved by a now-homeless former professor of medieval history, who encourages him to retrieve what he claims is the Holy Grail. When the DJ later learns that he is responsible for his saviour's misfortunes, he feels compelled to make amends. Terry Gilliam's comedy drama, with Robin Williams, Jeff Bridges, Amanda Plummer and Mercedes Ruehl.

programme.title: Elizabeth: The Golden Age
programme.desc: Queen Elizabeth I faces threats at home and abroad, as Mary, Queen of Scots plots against her while the King of Spain builds a vast armada to undertake an invasion of England. Unable to reconcile her feelings for the dashing Sir Walter Raleigh with her duty to her country, the monarch engineers a romance between the courtier and one of her ladies-in-waiting. Historical drama sequel, with Cate Blanchett, Clive Owen, Geoffrey Rush and Samantha Morton.

programme.title: PS I Love You
programme.desc: Widowed Holly feels she cannot cope following the death of her husband. However, on her birthday, she receives a letter he wrote to her just before he died, encouraging her to live life to the full rather than languish in sorrow. This is just the first in a series of messages, each one sending her on wild misadventures and helping her to move on. Romantic drama based on Cecelia Ahern's novel, starring Hilary Swank, Gerard Butler and Lisa Kudrow.

programme.title: The Danish Girl
programme.desc: Artist Gerda Wegener unveils a portrait of her husband Einar dressed as a woman in 1920s Copenhagen. Einar realises that the woman in the painting is his true identity, and decides to become one of the first people to undergo sex reassignment surgery. Period drama based on David Ebershoff's novel inspired by the true story of artist Lili Elbe, starring Eddie Redmayne and an Oscar-winning Alicia Vikander.

programme.title: The Boy in the Striped Pyjamas
programme.desc: Bruno, a boy in Nazi Germany, moves to the country when his father is placed in charge of a concentration camp. While exploring the woods close to the facility's boundary, he spots a Jewish youngster being held there, and the two become friends - but Bruno remains innocently oblivious to the camp's true purpose. Drama, starring David Thewlis, Asa Butterfield and Jack Scanlon.

programme.title: One Life
programme.desc: In the months leading up to the Second World War, a young London stockbroker attempts to rescue hundreds of predominantly Jewish children from Nazi-occupied Czechoslovakia. Fifty years later he comes to terms with the guilt and grief he carried with him for decades. Drama based on a true story, starring Anthony Hopkins, Lena Olin and Johnny Flynn.

programme.title: The Bridges at Toko-Ri
programme.desc: An American naval reserve pilot is called up for service in the Korean War, and must leave his family and civilian job as a lawyer. In command of a corps of naval pilots, he heads a bombing campaign on strategic Communist positions, but later comes to question the morality of the conflict. Adventure, starring William Holden, Grace Kelly, Fredric March and Mickey Rooney.

programme.title: Schindler's List
programme.desc: In German-occupied Poland during the Second World War, businessman and Nazi Party member Oskar Schindler is deeply affected when he witnesses the clearing of the Krakow Ghetto. He decides to try to save Jews destined for the concentration camps by employing them in his factory - an act of mercy made possible by a deal struck with a sadistic German commandant. Steven Spielberg's Oscar-winning drama, starring Liam Neeson, Ben Kingsley and Ralph Fiennes.

programme.title: Darkest Hour
programme.desc: May 1940. As the Nazis advance against Britain's European allies, newly elected prime minister Winston Churchill must decide whether to leave neighbouring countries to their fate, by striking a peace deal with Hitler, or fight on against terrifying odds for the greater good. Double Oscar and Bafta-winning period drama, starring Gary Oldman, Lily James and Kristin Scott Thomas.

programme.title: There Will Be Blood
programme.desc: An oil prospector presents the public image of a caring family man while nurturing a murderous ambition to seize control of land and wealth at any cost. But his insatiable greed leads to a violent conflict with a young priest who is also intent on using the people and resources of an oil-rich town for his own ends. Paul Thomas Anderson's historical drama, starring an Oscar-winning Daniel Day-Lewis, with Paul Dano and Dillon Freasier.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview - October 2025
programme.desc: Previews of the films now playing on Sky Cinema, plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.title: Rob Peace
programme.desc: A young man is torn between his father's shadowed past and his own promising future. Raised by his devoted mother, Rob Peace risks everything he has worked for to free his imprisoned dad. Drama, starring Chiwetel Ejiofor, who also adapted Jeff Hobbs' book and directed, with Jay Will, Camila Cabello and Mary J Blige.

programme.title: Anatomy of a Murder
programme.desc: An Army officer is accused of murdering a bartender, whom he claims he killed because the man raped his wife. He turns to a tenacious lawyer to get him off the hook, but the attorney faces a challenge because the prosecution alleges the defendant killed the barman because he was having an affair with his wife. Otto Preminger's courtroom drama, starring James Stewart, Ben Gazzara, Lee Remick and Eve Arden.

programme.title: Schindler's List
programme.desc: In German-occupied Poland during the Second World War, businessman and Nazi Party member Oskar Schindler is deeply affected when he witnesses the clearing of the Krakow Ghetto. He decides to try to save Jews destined for the concentration camps by employing them in his factory - an act of mercy made possible by a deal struck with a sadistic German commandant. Steven Spielberg's Oscar-winning drama, starring Liam Neeson, Ben Kingsley and Ralph Fiennes.

programme.title: Ferrari
programme.desc: During the summer of 1957, ex-racecar driver Enzo Ferrari is in crisis. Bankruptcy stalks the company he and his wife, Laura, built from nothing a decade earlier. Their tempestuous marriage struggles with the mourning for one son and the acknowledgement of another. Attempting to secure their survival, he rolls the dice on one race - 1,000 miles across Italy, the iconic Mille Miglia. Director Michael Mann's drama, starring Adam Driver and Jack O'Connell.

programme.title: Dear John
programme.desc: A soldier falls in love with a student he meets while on two weeks' leave, and he promises to seek her out after completing his tour of duty. However, in the aftermath of the September 11 attacks, he decides to re-enlist in the army, putting their relationship to the test. Romantic drama, with Channing Tatum and Amanda Seyfried.

programme.title: Dreamgirls
programme.desc: A 1960s singing trio are chosen to perform backing vocals for a popular performer - an event that launches the band on a successful career of their own. However, when the most attractive of the girls is picked as the face of the group, edging out the other two, personal rivalries begin to jeopardise their friendship. Musical drama, inspired by the rise to fame of Diana Ross and the Supremes, and starring Jamie Foxx, Beyonce Knowles, Eddie Murphy and an Oscar-winning Jennifer Hudson.

programme.title: Mamma Mia!
programme.desc: A former member of a singing trio, now running a hotel on a Greek island, is reunited with her old bandmates for her daughter's wedding - but is surprised when three of her old flames also show up unexpectedly. The three men have been invited by the bride, who wants to find out which one of them is her father. Musical comedy, with a soundtrack of Abba songs, starring Meryl Streep, Pierce Brosnan, Julie Walters, Colin Firth, Stellan Skarsgard and Amanda Seyfried.

programme.title: Mamma Mia! Here We Go Again
programme.desc: It's five years since Sophie invited her three possible dads to her wedding, and now most of her family are reunited as she prepares for the grand reopening of the Hotel Bella Donna. Along the way, she learns more about her mother's past. Abba-themed musical sequel, starring Amanda Seyfried, Lily James, Pierce Brosnan, Cher and Andy Garcia.

programme.title: The Holiday
programme.desc: Two single women living on opposite sides of the Atlantic agree to exchange houses over the Christmas holidays. In their new surroundings, both women unexpectedly encounter prospective partners, but as the house swap draws to a close, difficult decisions have to be made about their blossoming relationships. Romantic comedy, starring Cameron Diaz, Kate Winslet, Jack Black, Jude Law and Eli Wallach.

programme.title: The Good Half
programme.desc: Returning home for his mother's funeral, Renn Wheeland forges new relationships and heals old ones as he faces his grief. Drama, starring Nick Jonas, David Arquette and Brittany Snow.

programme.title: True Grit
programme.desc: One-eyed, over-the-hill US Marshal Rooster Cogburn reluctantly agrees to help a girl track down her father's killer. The quest is complicated by a Texas Ranger, who is also on the murderer's trail, and a host of villains who have few qualms about disposing of the meddling youngster and her protector. Western, starring an Oscar-winning John Wayne alongside Jeff Corey, Kim Darby, Glen Campbell, Robert Duvall and Dennis Hopper.

programme.title: Bob Marley: One Love
programme.desc: In 1976, Jamaica is dangerously divided across political lines and musician Bob Marley vows to quell the violence by performing at the Smile Jamaica Concert. Two days before the high-profile gig, gunmen break into the singer's home, shooting Bob, his wife Rita and manager Don Taylor. Everyone survives and Marley moves to London with his entourage to begin work on the LP Exodus under Island Records supremo Chris Blackwell. Biographical drama, starring Kingsley Ben-Adir, Lashana Lynch and James Norton.

programme.title: Lost in Translation
programme.desc: A lonely and past-his-prime American actor travels to Japan to film a commercial. During a depressing night in the hotel bar, he meets a spirited younger woman and the pair strike up a close friendship, exploring Tokyo and helping each other face the mundanities of everyday life. Sofia Coppola's comedy drama, starring Bill Murray, Scarlett Johansson and Giovanni Ribisi.

programme.title: Dallas Buyers Club
programme.desc: A man diagnosed with HIV and given 30 days to live discovers that many treatments for his condition are not available in the US. With the aid of a transsexual Aids patient, he sets up a scheme to smuggle the drugs into the country and distribute them to those in need. Fact-based drama, starring Oscar winners Matthew McConaughey and Jared Leto, with Jennifer Garner and Steve Zahn.

Drama, starring David Thewlis, Asa Butterfield and Jack Scanlon.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview - October 2025
programme.desc: Previews of the films now playing on Sky Cinema, plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.title: Elizabeth: The Golden Age
programme.desc: Queen Elizabeth I faces threats at home and abroad, as Mary, Queen of Scots plots against her while the King of Spain builds a vast armada to undertake an invasion of England. Unable to reconcile her feelings for the dashing Sir Walter Raleigh with her duty to her country, the monarch engineers a romance between the courtier and one of her ladies-in-waiting. Historical drama sequel, with Cate Blanchett, Clive Owen, Geoffrey Rush and Samantha Morton.(n)

programme.title: Grease
programme.desc: Rebellious American teenager Danny falls for innocent Australian girl Sandy during the summer holidays, but when he later finds out she is a new student at his school, he risks losing her love by trying to act cool in front of his friends. Romantic musical set in the 1950s, starring John Travolta, Olivia Newton-John, Stockard Channing, Jeff Conaway, Didi Conn and Sid Caesar.(n)

programme.title: The Color Purple
programme.desc: Teenager Celie suffers horribly at the hands of her abusive father Alfonso until she is married off against her will to local farmer Mister, who expects her to take care of his three children. Celie's spirited sister Nettie refuses to submit to Mister and leaves Georgia, but promises to write every day. Years pass and Celie has been worn down to quiet subservience, until Mister's mistress, sultry jazz singer Shug Avery, sashays into town and lights a fire in the broken wife. Musical drama based on Alice Walker's 1982 novel, starring Fantasia Barrino, Taraji P Henson, Colman Domingo and Danielle Brooks.(n)

programme.title: Charming the Hearts of Men
programme.desc: A sophisticated woman returns to her Southern home town and discovers her options are limited yet discrimination is plentiful. With the help of a Congressional ally, she inspires historic legislation that allows opportunities and protections never before afforded to women. Historical romance, starring Kelsey Grammer, Anna Friel and Sean Astin.(n)

programme.title: Lost in Translation
programme.desc: A lonely and past-his-prime American actor travels to Japan to film a commercial. During a depressing night in the hotel bar, he meets a spirited younger woman and the pair strike up a close friendship, exploring Tokyo and helping each other face the mundanities of everyday life. Sofia Coppola's comedy drama, starring Bill Murray, Scarlett Johansson and Giovanni Ribisi.(n)

programme.title: Sleepless in Seattle
programme.desc: A widowed father is coping badly with his wife's death, but his son is convinced that what he really needs is some new romance in his life. He arranges for his dad to go on a radio phone-in show, and his touching story moves a reporter to respond, even though she is already engaged. She returns to her fiance, but the boy, certain she is the woman for his father, plots to bring them together. Romantic comedy, with Tom Hanks and Meg Ryan.(n)

programme.title: Aisha
programme.desc: While caught up in limbo for years in Ireland's immigration system, Nigerian refugee Aisha Osagie develops a close relationship with former prisoner Conor Healy. However, their friendship soon comes under threat as Aisha's future in Ireland is jeopardised. Drama, starring Letitia Wright, Josh O'Connor and Ruth McCabe.(n)

programme.title: Dunkirk
programme.desc: Allied soldiers from Belgium, the British Empire and France are surrounded by the German army, and face a tense wait for evacuation, during a fierce battle in northern France during the Second World War. Christopher Nolan's wartime drama, which he wrote, directed and produced, starring Kenneth Branagh, Tom Hardy, Mark Rylance and Fionn Whitehead.(n)

programme.title: Oslo
programme.desc: Drama based on the true story of negotiations between implacable enemies - the secret back-channel talks, unlikely friendships and quiet heroics of a small but committed group of Israelis, Palestinians and one Norwegian couple that led to the 1993 Oslo Peace Accords. Starring Ruth Wilson, Andrew Scott and Jeff Wilbusch.(n)

programme.title: The Holiday
programme.desc: Two single women living on opposite sides of the Atlantic agree to exchange houses over the Christmas holidays. In their new surroundings, both women unexpectedly encounter prospective partners, but as the house swap draws to a close, difficult decisions have to be made about their blossoming relationships. Romantic comedy, starring Cameron Diaz, Kate Winslet, Jack Black, Jude Law and Eli Wallach.(n)

But his insatiable greed leads to a violent conflict with a young priest who is also intent on using the people and resources of an oil-rich town for his own ends. Paul Thomas Anderson's historical drama, starring an Oscar-winning Daniel Day-Lewis, with Paul Dano and Dillon Freasier.(n)

programme.title: Code 3
programme.desc: On his final shift, a burned-out paramedic has to train his keen but inexperienced replacement. What begins as a routine night soon descends into a chaotic, citywide odyssey that tests their endurance. Co-writer/director Christopher Leone's action comedy, starring Rainn Wilson, Lil Rel Howery and Aimee Carrero.(n)

programme.title: Juliet & Romeo
programme.desc: Two lovers find themselves central figures in a journey of battles and betrayal. Musical version of the classic tale, starring Clara Rugaard, Jamie Ward, Rebel Wilson and Jason Isaacs.(n)

programme.title: Grow
programme.desc: Rivals pull every trick in the book to win a pumpkin-growing contest, but it remains to be seen whether farmer Dinah Little and her talented niece, Charlie, will come out on top. Comedy, starring Nick Frost, Golda Rosheuvel and Priya-Rose Brookwell.(n)

programme.title: Panda Plan
programme.desc: An international action superstar gets involved in a rescue operation of a beloved zoo panda named Hu Hu. Chinese comedy, starring Jackie Chan and Xiang Wei, with subtitles.(n)

programme.title: The Stranger in My Home
programme.desc: A stranger's claim that a couple's 15-year-old daughter was switched at birth throws their perfect family into turmoil, unearthing shattering secrets. Drama, starring Sophia Bush, Chris Carmack and Amiah Miller.(n)

programme.title: Presence
programme.desc: A family become convinced they are not alone after moving into their new home in the suburbs. Steven Soderbergh's horror thriller, starring Lucy Liu, Chris Sullivan, Callina Liang and Eddy Maday.(n)

programme.desc: A man with amnesia teams up with a tough survivalist during a zombie-like outbreak. Together, they navigate dangers and search for the amnesiac's missing girlfriend.

programme.title: Die Alone

programme.title: Cloverfield
programme.desc: A group of friends keep the cameras rolling as a skyscraper-sized monster rampages through Manhattan. Found-footage creature feature. Violence/mature themes.

programme.desc: With America in the grip of a zombie apocalypse, Woody Harrelson and Jesse Eisenberg team up to survive. With Emma Stone. Violence/strong language.

programme.desc: A man kidnaps a woman and holds her hostage just for the pleasure of having her there. Classic thriller.

Animated comedy, wit

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania
programme.desc: Dracula opens a luxury resort for monsters, to provide a refuge from terrified humans. His cosy sanctuary is disrupted when a normal man unwittingly checks in, and the situation is complicated when the unwanted guest takes a liking to the count's daughter. Animated comedy, with the voices of Adam Sandler and Andy Samberg.

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania 2
programme.desc: Dracula is worried that his half-human grandson is not showing any vampiric tendencies, so enlists the help of his fellow monsters in showing the youngster how it is done. The count is shocked to receive an unwelcome visit from his own father, who does not approve of his son's tolerance of humans. Animated comedy, with the voices of Adam Sandler and Andy Samberg.

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania 3: A Monster Vacation
programme.desc: Count Dracula and company participate in a cruise for sea-loving monsters, unaware that their boat is being commandeered by the monster-hating Van Helsing family. Animated sequel, featuring the voices of Adam Sandler, Andy Samberg and Selena Gomez.

programme.title: Aquaman and the Lost Kingdom
programme.desc: The underwater kingdom of Atlantis's fate hangs in the balance when ruthless mercenary David Kane, aka Black Manta, attempts to avenge his father's death at the hands of Aquaman by wielding a mythical trident. Fantasy adventure, starring Jason Momoa, Yahya Abdul-Mateen II, Patrick Wilson, Dolph Lundgren, Nicole Kidman and Amber Heard.

programme.title: Spider-Man
programme.desc: A clumsy teenager develops superhuman powers after a genetically engineered spider bites him. At first his fantastic skills delight him, but his elation is severely tempered by a family tragedy, prompting him to dedicate his talents to combating evil. However, he faces a baptism of fire in the form of crazed villain the Green Goblin. Comic-book superhero adventure, with Tobey Maguire, Kirsten Duns

programme.title: Spider-Man 2
programme.desc: Peter Parker continues his fight for justice, but unrequited love and personal worries take their toll and he is tempted to abandon his web-slinging alter ego. However, the arrival of deadly new bad guy Doctor Octopus plunges him into a race against time to save New York. Comic-book adventure sequel, with Tobey Maguire, Kirsten Dunst, Alfred Molina, James Franco and Rosemary Harris.

programme.title: Spider-Man 3
programme.desc: A sinister alien parasite brings out the web-slinging hero's darker side, filling him with thoughts of revenge on his uncle's murderer, the shape-shifting Sandman. Superhero sequel, with Tobey Maguire, Kirsten Dunst and Jame

programme.title: The Green Hornet
programme.desc: A wealthy playboy inherits a media empire when his father dies. Determined to do some good for a change, he uses his new-found fortune to become a masked crime-fighter. Comic-book adventure, starring Seth Rogen, Jay Chou, Cameron Diaz and Christoph Waltz.

programme.title: Hollow Man

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview-Oct 2025
programme.desc: Previews of the films now playing on Sky Cinema plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.title: Ghost Rider
programme.desc: Motorcycle stuntman Johnny Blaze sells his soul to diabolical Mephistopheles to save the life of his father. His bargain dooms him to pass each night as Ghost Rider, a demonic skeletal biker bound to take evil souls to Hell. However, conflict between Mephistopheles and his son offers Johnny the chance to win back his humanity. Fantasy thriller based on the comic-book, starring Nicolas Cage, Eva Me

programme.title: Ghost Rider: Spirit of Vengeance
programme.desc: The demon biker roams Eastern Europe, looking for a way to rid himself of his supernatural alter ego. He is approached by a mysterious monk, who needs help protecting a boy from the horrific destiny the Devil has in store for him. Fantasy thriller sequel, starring Nicolas Cage, Idris Elba, Ciaran Hinds and Christopher Lambert.

programme.title: Total Recall
programme.desc: A man living in a bleak future years after a nuclear war has fake memories of being a secret agent implanted into his brain. However, the procedure uncovers the fact that he really is a spy with his memory erased, and he is forced to become a fugitive from the totalitarian government. Sci-fi thriller remake, with Colin Farrell, Kate Beckinsale and Jessica Biel.

programme.title: Happy Gilmore
programme.desc: A second-rate ice-hockey player with a thuggish temperament discovers he has a powerful golf swing. He decides to enter a prestigious tournament to raise enough money to save his debt-ridden grandmother's house from falling into the hands of tax inspectors. Comedy, with Adam Sandler, Christopher McDonald, Carl Weathers, Julie Bowen and Frances Bay.

programme.title: Nacho Libre
programme.desc: A portly Mexican friar working as a cook in an orphanage adopts the guise of a masked wrestler. He teams up with a thief and enters a tournament hoping to win enough money to sort out the monastery's financial problems, feed the kids under his care and impress the nun he is in love with. Comedy, starring Jack Black and Ana de la Reguera.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda 3
programme.desc: The clumsy hero is reunited with his long-lost father, whose help he will need when a supernatural foe threatens all of China. Father and son travel to a secret village populated by other pandas, and must train them in martial arts so they can defend their home. Animated comedy sequel, with the voices of Jack Black, Bryan Cranston, Angelina Jolie and Dustin Hoffman.

programme.title: The Holiday
programme.desc: Two single women living on opposite sides of the Atlantic agree to exchange houses over the Christmas holidays. In their new surroundings, both women unexpectedly encounter prospective partners, but as the house swap draws to a close, difficult decisions have to be made about their blossoming relationships. Romantic comedy, starring Cameron Diaz, Kate Winslet, Jack Black, Jude Law and Eli Wallach.

programme.title: Love Actually
programme.desc: Ten interlinked stories of people searching for and finding love. While the newly elected, bachelor British prime minister is smitten by a junior staff member at 10 Downing Street, a heartbroken writer heads for France to get over a failed relationship, and a faded rock star aims to reinvent himself in time for Christmas. Richard Curtis's romantic comedy, with Hugh Grant, Martine McCutcheon, Emma

programme.title: Crazy Rich Asians
programme.desc: When New York University professor Rachel Chu heads to Singapore with her boyfriend, Nick Young, she's surprised to learn he's from an extremely wealthy family. The problem is they aren't so approving of her, so she attempts to win them over. Blockbusting comedy based on Kevin Kwan's novel, starring Constance Wu, Henry Golding, Gemma Chan and Michelle Yeoh.

programme.title: You, Me and Dupree
programme.desc: Thirtysomething slacker Dupree finds himself out of a job with nowhere to live, and turns to his newly married best friend Carl for a place to stay. But Carl comes to regret his act of hospitality as the layabout shows no sign of ever moving out - not to mention his annoyance when his new wife takes a liking to their laid-back guest. Comedy, starring Owen Wilson, Matt Dillon, Kate Hudson and Micha

programme.title: The Nutty Professor
programme.desc: An obese, terminally shy professor invents a potion that transforms him into a slim, loud-mouthed charmer. His new streamlined self immediately sets out to woo the woman of his dreams - but soon starts to ride roughshod over everything he used to care about. Remake of the 1963 Jerry Lewis comedy, starring Eddie Murphy, Jada Pinkett Smith, James Coburn and Larry Miller.

Logan must now protect the girl and battle the dark forces that want to capture her.

As their mission of discovery soon becomes one of survival, they must fight to escape from a primal world where humanity does not belong.

programme.title: The Dark Knight

But when a young criminal calling himself the Joker suddenly throws the town into chaos, the caped crusader begins to tread a fine line between heroism and vigilantism.

programme.title: Superman

Will intrepid reporter Lois Lane and Superman's four-legged companion, Krypto, be able to help him before it's too late?

programme.title: Opus

programme.title: Mountainhead
programme.desc: Four friends reunite during worldwide economic turmoil.

programme.title: Pride
programme.desc: In 1970s Philadelphia, Jim Ellis (Terrence Howard), who is driven by a love of competitive swimming, fixes up an abandoned pool building with the help of a janitor named Elston (Bernie Mac). But when city officials mark the place for demolition, he fights back by founding an all-black swim team. programme.title: User Zero
programme.desc: A passionate neuroscientist must save her patients from her own invention before losing her mind.

programme.title: Waitress: The Musical
programme.desc: Jenna Hunterson is a waitress and expert pie maker stuck in a small town and a loveless marriage. When a baking contest offers her a chance at escape, Jenna fights to reclaim part of herself.

programme.title: The Color Purple
programme.desc: Torn apart from her sister and her children, Celie faces many hardships in life, including an abusive husband. With support from a sultry singer named Shug Avery, as well as her stand-her-ground stepdaughter, Celie ultimately finds extraordinary strength in the unbreakable bonds of a new kind of sisterhood.

programme.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring

programme.title: Exterminate All the Brutes
programme.desc: Examining the intertwined currents of hate and bigotry running through history; exploring how race first became institutionalized, the Nazi program of "elimination" and the looting of the African continent in a "gentlemen's agreement.".

programme.title: Exterminate All the Brutes
programme.desc: Revisiting the stories of Christopher Columbus, the Alamo and the Trail of Tears from an indigenous perspective; examining the "doctrine of discovery," which was used to justify the enslavement of millions.

programme.title: Exterminate All the Brutes
programme.desc: Looking back at human migration, trade and weaponry; industrialized steel; the endless cycle of militarization throughout history; George Washington's efforts to jumpstart American arms manufacturing; the Monroe Doctrine; Hiroshima and Nagasaki.

programme.title: Exterminate All the Brutes
